name: n8ao
description: An efficient and visually pleasing implementation of SSAO with an emphasis on temporal stability and artist control.

scripts.build: rm -rf .parcel-cache && parcel build src/N8AOPass.js && cp dist/N8AO.js example/N8AO.js && cp dist/N8AO.js.map example/N8AO.js.map && cp dist/N8AO.js example_postprocessing/N8AO.js && cp dist/N8AO.js.map example_postprocessing/N8AO.js.map && cp dist/N8AO.js example_webgpu/N8AO.js && cp dist/N8AO.js.map example_webgpu/N8AO.js.map
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext .js --exec 'npm run build' & nodemon dev-server.js
